content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Plate Production Area (around position 0,0)
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at position (0,0) producing iron plates from iron ore
- Furnace 2 at position (2,0) producing iron plates from iron ore

###Copper Plate Production Area (around position 4,4)
- Stone furnace at position (4,4) producing copper plates from copper ore

###Electronic Circuit Production Line (around position 9.5,11.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at position (6.5,11.5)
- Burner inserter at position (7.5,11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at position (9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position (11.5,11.5) moving finished products
- Output chest at position (12.5,11.5) storing electronic circuits

###Power Generation System (around position -7,24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5,24.5) extracting water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at position (-7,24.5) generating steam
- Steam engine at position (-2.5,24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

###Research Lab Setup
- Lab researching Electronics technology
- Contains automation science packs
- Connected to power grid through electric poles

ERROR TIPS

### Entity placement errors
- When placing inserters next to labs or other buildings, ensure there is enough space and no collisions with existing entities
- Check that the placement direction and spacing parameters are compatible with the target location
- Verify the terrain allows placement (not trying to build on water)

### Resource management errors
- Check inventory has required items before attempting insertion operations
- Ensure sufficient coal is available for burner entities
- Monitor furnace fuel levels to maintain continuous operation

### Research errors
- Verify research prerequisites are met before attempting to research a technology
- Check that the selected research hasn't already been completed

### Production flow errors
- Monitor assembler ingredient levels to prevent production stoppages
- Ensure proper connection of inserters between input/output chests and assemblers
